Text: If any other themes need to be re-upped do let me know

Theme Description:

This contains 10 amazing Hi-res MJ wallpapers along with custom sounds for your windows 7 desktop.

Installation:

1)Extract here the rar files
2)Place the folder in C:Users-->Your Folder Name-->AppData(Hidden Folder)-->Local-->Microsoft-->Windows-->Themes Folder
3)Double click on the theme file to experience

I have 4 different MJ themes for my Win 7 - which I've downloaded form a different source. But what this torrent offering is really exclusive.

Is it even real? Confirm, anyone??
